summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and official count slips from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 6, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and includes administrative forms for tracking inmate locations and assignments, including notations for inmates on suicide watch or unassigned status.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with totals recorded by housing unit and notations for inmates in hospital or on suicide watch.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Document records inmate counts at Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York on August 6, 2019.
Total inmate count recorded as 759 with verification count of 756.
Inmate roster includes notations for inmates assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital) and 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (suicide watch or unassigned).
Forms are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative documents for tracking inmate locations and counts.
Document shows routine prison administrative procedures with no specific references to Jeffrey Epstein or other named individuals.
